levels.description:
Throws an Alchemical Unit; for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</>s, ground enemies around the landing point receive <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> less healing and recovery effects, and take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage per second; allies in the area recover HP equal to <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_ratio_chr:0%}</> ATK per second; the Alchemical Unit will slowly travel in the direction it was thrown and expand its area of effect over <@ba.vup>{remaining_time}</>s
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>

<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>
